title: league of legend classic 'afk check' bug
body:
when ever i tried to play a game on normal, and the afk check thing comes up, and i accept it. it would just stay like that, and kind of froze there. and keep in my Im have 16gb of ram and only like 3 gb is in use, and my cpu are always on 10-15 percentage at most 45. someone pls help, and sorry for my english.

update now it takes about 4 mins to open league of legend client smh

replies.body:
Is this happening in the Beta Client or Legacy Client? We've been receiving reports from some players that this behavior is only occurring on the Beta Client, which has prompted an investigation. We're still looking into it, but for now, I'd like you to try the *Legacy Client* from the login screen to test this again:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you experience this in both Clients.
